content: double_crochet double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next chain-3 space single_crochet in next 3 bpsc 2 half_double_crochet in next chain-3 space skip next double_crochet half_double_crochet in next chain-3 space working in front of chain-3 space tr2tog in worked scs of round 10 before and after popcorn of round 11 half_double_crochet in chain-3 space of round 13 just worked skip next double_crochet 3 times tr2tog stitch placement for 1st treble_crochet tr2tog stitch placement for 2nd treble_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next chain-3 space single_crochet in next 3 bpsc 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next chain-3 space skip next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space skip next double_crochet repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 24 single_crochet 56 half_double_crochet 40 double_crochet 12 decrease 8 chain-1 sps 4 chain-2 corner space 140 total/35 per side round 14 f ivory - large lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 6 of 13 starting in any chain-2 corner space * double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in chain-2 corner space double_crochet in 3lp of next double_crochet double_crochet in next chain-1 space working in 3lp double_crochet in next 31 sts double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in 3lp of next double_crochet repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join count 148 double_crochet 4 chain-2 corner sps 148 total/37 per side round 15 f ivory - large starting in any chain 2 corner space * single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 corner space single_crochet across each st to next chain-2 corner space repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join and weave in all yarn ends large square count 156 single_crochet 4 chain-2 corner sps 156 total/39 per side i highly recommend blocking this square to achieve your final shape and size blocking will also make your stitches even more defined and give your square a more professional appearance you can either wet block or steam block but always make sure you are careful when steam blocking acrylic yarn this pattern is copyright protected you may only print a copy of this pattern for your own use if you share your finished square link to my website a yarn of serendipity facebook page love crafts ravelry ribblr makerist or creative fabrica please do not distribute this pattern or photos in any other form lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 7 of 13 lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 8 of 13 lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 9 of 13 lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 10 of 13 lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 11 of 13 lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 12 of 13 lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 13 of 13
